title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 4218 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
December 16, 2009

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 4218




On December 15, 2009, the President signed into law:
H.R. 4218, the No Social Security Benefits for Prisoners Act of 2009, which prohibits retroactive payments of Social Security benefits to eligible individuals who are in prison, fleeing from prosecution, or in violation of parole or probation.
